requirements.summary: Reduce the visual size and clickable area of the Upload Artwork button/input control on UploadView while maintaining visibility and accessibility
acceptanceCriteria: The Upload Artwork button/input on the main upload page has reduced width and height compared to the current implementation
The clickable/interactive area of the upload control is proportionally reduced
The upload control remains clearly visible and usable after the size reduction
The size reduction applies only to the main upload page, not to any other upload controls that may exist elsewhere

file_operations.description: Reduce the dimensions of the Upload Artwork button/input control by applying smaller padding, width constraints, and font sizes to the upload control element. Ensure the clickable area is proportionally reduced while maintaining clear visibility and accessibility. Apply size reductions only to the upload control used in the main upload page context, preserving any other upload controls elsewhere in the component unchanged.
